hymn.title: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray

layout.singingstanza: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray; This is my heart- -- cry day un -- to day; I long to know Thy will and Thy way; Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray. Liv -- ing in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me, Con -- stant a -- bid -- ing, this is my plea; Grant me Thy pow -- er, bound -- less and free, Pow -- er with men and pow -- er with Thee.

lyrics.stanza: Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me, Constant abiding, this is my plea; Grant me Thy power, boundless and free, Power with men and power with Thee.
Power in prayer, Lord, power in prayer! Here 'mid earth's sin and sorrow and care, Men lost and dying, souls in despair; O give me power, power in prayer!
